overview: Dare to open the doors that others choose to pass by” Goethe  Doors Mexico City, Bogotá, Mompox and Sopó. William Blake poems, microrrelatos Luis Vidales, Luisa Valenzuela and Camila Garcia and a poem by Paul Muldoon. Audiovisual Movement official sample selection, Guadalajara, Mexico, 2018. Official Selection Sweetest Ovary, Hidalgo, Mexico, 2018. Official Selection Experiments in Cinema v14.2, USA, 2019.
title: The Doors of Perception
